channel.title: Us News Rankings on Anything Data
channel.description: Recent content in Us News Rankings on Anything Data

item.title: Top MBA Programs by US News
item.description: Somebody once asked me for reccomendations on MBA programs based on rank and tuition. I didn’t have any information on hand, but knew how toget it. Webscraping. Webscraping is an immensly useful tool for gathering data from webpages, when it isn’t hosted on an API or stored in a file somewhere. R’s best tool for webscraping is Rvest. So I decided to scrape information on the US News website for university rankings, which has at least 20 pages of MBA probrams available.
